name: Cinderella Nail Salon - Fashion Design Art
name_original: Cinderella Nail Salon - Fashion Design Art
description:
Do you wish to have exceptional nails? Be a nail artist! Paint and design your nails with a whole new makeover like a star in this fun dress up and make up game. Choose from variety of polish color collections and designs available to decorate your nails.Create your own remarkable style and make your nail much more beautiful. Exciting fun and addicting dress up game.

HOW TO PLAY:

Tap the screen and start dressing your nails.

-Fashionable Nail Shapes
-Trendy Polish and Designs
-Awesome Backgrounds
-Cool Sounds

Challenge Your Friends and See Who Creates the Trendiest and Fashionable Looks!

EXCITING FUN!!

Download ‘Cinderella Nail Salon – Fashion Design Art’ now and have some fun.
